about_the_game:
"Don't! Fret" is a first person psychological mascot-horror puzzle game, where music and horror intertwine in ways never before seen by the indie gaming community. Navigate the hallways of Harmonic Heights as "Fret," a young talented guitar who is in search of finding a way back home.

MEET FRET

Step into the shoes of Fret, a prodigious musical student, and embark on a mind-bending journey with perplexing puzzles that gradually unveil the horrific tales within the walls.

STYLIZED VISUALS

With stylized art, unparalleled sound design and nightmarish creatures, Don't! Fret creates an completely unique horror gaming experience.

RUN AND HIDE

Don't! Fret offers a distinctive horror gameplay experience. You'll find yourself in a relentless pursuit, running and concealing yourself from the malevolent forces prowling through the ominous halls. Brace yourself for an adrenaline-pumping adventure like no other.

EXPLORE THE NIGHTMARE

Delve into the mysteries concealed within the confines of Don't! Fret, but proceed with caution—what lurks within those walls may be more than meets the eye. Approach with care, for danger may be closer than you think.

DON'T! BE FOOLED

To the naked eye, the musical world of Don't! Fret might be charming. As you dive deeper into the horrific tale, you will sink a psychological nightmare with horrific scenes and set pieces.


ROCKIT MUSIC

The world of Don't! Fret, and the music is created by Rockit of Rockit Music. As pioneers in the Nerdcore music genre, they stand at the forefront, boasting an impressive record of over 400 million views and a thriving community of over 1 million subscribers on YouTube. Their expertise lies in crafting immersive soundscapes inspired by indie horror and pop culture, ensuring an electrifying auditory experience for enthusiasts and casual listeners alike.

Don't! Fret is truly one-of-a-kind adventure that you can't miss!

name: Don't! Fret

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K | AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060 8GB or Radeon RX 580 8GB or Arc A380.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: Meeting the minimum requirements will allow the game to run at Low to Medium settings in Full HD (1080p) with a stable 30 FPS. For an optimal experience, we recommend using an SSD for faster load times and smoother gameplay. Please note that during certain cutscenes, performance may be impacted if the CPU usage is high, which could result in rendering issues.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K | AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 2080RTX or AMD Radeon™ 6800XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: With the recommended requirements, the game is expected to run at Medium settings or High settings in Full HD (1080p) with a smooth 60 FPS. For the best experience, we recommend using an SSD to ensure faster load times and optimal performance.

short_description: Don't! Fret is a stylized first-person psychological mascot-horror game set in a musically themed world. Play as a guitar named Fret to solve puzzles, escape from foes, and uncover the mystery behind Harmonic Heights.
